mapper.select: select title, u.username, count, c.categoryname, b.id from board b, user u, category c where b.userId = u.id and b.categoryId = c.categoryId order by b.count desc limit 0,5
select b.id, b.content, b.count, b.title, u.username from board b, user u where b.userId = u.id order by b.createDate desc, id limit 10 offset #{param1}
select count(*) from board where categoryId = 1
select b.id, b.content, b.count, b.title, b.createDate, b.userId, b.categoryId, u.username from board b, user u where b.userId = u.id and b.id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into board(content, title, userId, categoryId) values(#{content}, #{title}, #{userId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.content, r.createDate, r.boardId, r.userId, u.username, u.id from reply r, user u where boardId = #{id} and r.userId = u.id
mapper.update: update board set count = count+1 where id = #{id}
